channel.title: Arma 3 [Arma 3 Lite Giveaway]
channel.description:
Personally, I hated the new controls but the new crouches are not that half bad of an idea. Also was looking forward to being able to dive over things but I guess, this isn't Battlefield (which is completely overrated compared to this game). Had fun with it while I had it and cant wait to get it again. The fps hasn't really improved as much as I was anticipating but it was a few steps. I do however absolutely love the customization weapons, cannot wait to see what we can do with the Sniper Rifles.
Bought the wrong package on the day of release so I have to wait a couple of working days before I can get my refund to buy the standard, lol.
So... wbu?
[hr] Btw, buy it now while it's cheap. The price is around $35USD and will be around $90USD when it's out of for full release, once you've got Alpha you have Beta and the full game :)
[hr] [b]I have a few left over gifts, just message me your steam and if I know you and think you deserve it then you should have a message soon[/b]
